website_summaries.verdict: The Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado is an excellent silhouette that provides lots of comfort and retro style. The shoes are lightweight, flexible, have a good fit, and are priced less than their value.They also have pleasing color combinations and provide excellent traction. The shoes’ only drawbacks are that they run small and that they don’t contain much cushioning.
pros: Many users commented that the Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado are comfortable shoes that they could walk in all day
The low-top casual sneakers have a great retro style according to plenty of reviewers
A good number of testers were pleased to find that the casual low-tops had a perfect fit width-wise
The color schemes of the Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado sneakers are bright and eye-catching, several purchasers reported
The lifestyle shoes feel light when walking, some people indicated
A few individuals remarked that these low-top sneakers’ have an excellent price when compared to their quality
One person stated that the Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado shoes have good traction
A customer recounted how his son used the sneakers for Parkour and that the shoes gave just the right amount of flexibility
cons: Many people reported that the Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado ran small
A few users complained that the shoes contained very little cushioning
A couple of consumers were not pleased to find that the insoles were not removable

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really love these shoes. They're near perfect all-around. They fit as expected, look amazing and were reasonably priced when I purchased them a year or more ago and I have kept them in great shape. The insole heel will probably be worn out in a couple of months, but that's not a huge problem. I wear them to work a couple of times a week and have received a lot of compliments on them. Depending on how long these last and whether or not this particular line is still available, I would consider purchasing another pair. And I'm not sure if I've ever said that about any shoe before. Easy five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ansen Plopbundle

customer_reviews.title: Love every one of them
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 pair of Onitsuka. Love every one of them. This is my favorite in terms of looks thus far. However, it is the first pair I had to send back my 12 for a 12.5. This one absolutely ran smaller than all my others (which are all 12's.)
customer_reviews.author: Ininkus

customer_reviews.title: I love Onitsuka Tigers
customer_reviews.text: I love Onitsuka Tigers. They are always light and comfy. However, anticipating the accuracy of the sizing is always a bit of a toss up. This particular set were a bit tight at first and the ridge of the back of the shoe would put too much pressure on the back of my foot making them difficult to wear. However, after about three days of heavy walking they broke in and have become one my most comfortable purchases of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker. Just run a little small so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker. Just run a little small so you have to go up at least half a size. I read the reviews so Instead of a 91/2 I got my husband a 10 and they were just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are made of comfortable material. However
customer_reviews.text: They are made of comfortable material. However, I bought a size 11, 1/2 a size than my foot and still a little tight, and generally a narrow pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Onitsuka tiger is my favorite brand. my size usually is 8 but after ...
customer_reviews.text: Onitsuka tiger is my favorite brand. my size usually is 8 but after reading the reviews, i ordered 8.5 it did fit well
customer_reviews.author: Ihab Alami

customer_reviews.title: Buy Buy Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoes! As expected you never go wrong with Onitsuka
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tigers! Im usually a 12 but ordered 12.5 per a friend's advice, as this brand tends to run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Novoa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and comfort. Starting falling apart after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickGC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design. Just get a size or 2 larger than your usual onitsuka. Smaller fit.
customer_reviews.author: Drei P.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: You have to get 1 size up than your normal sneaker size. I exchanged this twice before i got the right fit. Started with 11.5, then 12, then 12.5
customer_reviews.author: J. Castillo

product_meta.title: ASICS - Onitsuka Tiger Alvarado Sneakers
feature_bullets: Get that fresh street style with the Alvarado from Onitsuka Tiger by Asics.
This brand is a member of the Sustainable Apparel Coalition.
Suede and mesh uppers with a round toe.

Traditional lace-up closure for a secure fit. Breathable textile linings. TPU heel protector. Lightweight foam midsole. Durable waffle outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 14 oz Product measurements were taken using size Men's 12, width Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.
